title.narrative: Global Led Priorities to Carry Out Principled, Effective and Accountable Responses for the Benefit of Crisis-Affected Populations

description.narrative: The project enhances the organization’s global capacity to carry out principled, effective and accountable responses to the needs of populations affected and displaced by natural disasters and conflict, in line with global commitments agreed upon in the framework of the World Humanitarian Summit, the Grand Bargain, the 2030 Agenda for Humanity and their related follow-up processes. The priorities and activities proposed in this project aim to: (1) Enhance transparency and efficiency through improved tracking and real-time reporting on IOM’s humanitarian programming; and (2) Improve planning and responses through needs assessment, analysis and better understanding of mobility Activities that fall under both objectives are geared towards strengthening institutional capacity and improving the quality and accountability of IOM’s humanitarian responses. Those pertaining to the first objective are institution-oriented; those pertaining to the second are response-oriented.
